title: 2FAuth (CasaOS)
name: casaos-2fauth
composefile_content:
name: 2fauth
services:
  2fauth:
    image: 2fauth/2fauth:5.4.3
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          memory: 64M
    network_mode: bridge
    ports:
      - target: 8000
        published: '8000'
        protocol: tcp
    restart: always
    volumes:
      - 2fauth_data:/2fauth
    container_name: 2fauth
volumes:
  2fauth_data: {}
note:
Portainer template generated from CasaOS AppStore. Original app ID: 2fauth.
Review volumes and configurations. PUID/PGID default to 1000, TZ to Etc/UTC. App-specific paths like '/DATA/AppData/2fauth/...' have been converted to Docker named volumes (e.g., 'casaos-2fauth_config', 'casaos-2fauth_data'). Ensure these named volumes are suitable or adjust as needed.

title: AdGuardHome (CasaOS)
name: casaos-adguard-home
composefile_content:
name: adguard-home
services:
  adguard-home:
    image: adguard/adguardhome:v0.107.55
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          memory: 64M
    network_mode: bridge
    ports:
      - target: 53
        published: '531'
        protocol: tcp
      - target: 53
        published: '531'
        protocol: udp
      - target: 3000
        published: '3001'
        protocol: tcp
      - target: 853
        published: '853'
        protocol: tcp
      - target: 784
        published: '784'
        protocol: udp
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - adguard-home_opt_adguardhome_work:/opt/adguardhome/work
      - adguard-home_opt_adguardhome_conf:/opt/adguardhome/conf
    container_name: adguard-home
volumes:
  adguard-home_opt_adguardhome_work: {}
  adguard-home_opt_adguardhome_conf: {}
note:
Portainer template generated from CasaOS AppStore. Original app ID: adguard Home.
Review volumes and configurations. PUID/PGID default to 1000, TZ to Etc/UTC. App-specific paths like '/DATA/AppData/adguard Home/...' have been converted to Docker named volumes (e.g., 'casaos-adguard-home_config', 'casaos-adguard-home_data'). Ensure these named volumes are suitable or adjust as needed.

title: Bazarr (CasaOS)
name: casaos-bazarr
composefile_content:
name: bazarr
services:
  bazarr:
    environment:
      - PGID=1000
      - PUID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/London
    image: linuxserver/bazarr:1.5.1
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          memory: 64M
    network_mode: bridge
    ports:
      - target: 6767
        published: '6767'
        protocol: tcp
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - type: bind
        source: /DATA/Media/Movies
        target: /movies
      - type: bind
        source: /DATA/Media/TV Shows
        target: /tv
      - type: bind
        source: /DATA/AppData/bazarr/config
        target: /config
    container_name: bazarr
note:
Portainer template generated from CasaOS AppStore. Original app ID: Bazarr.
Review volumes and configurations. PUID/PGID default to 1000, TZ to Etc/UTC. App-specific paths like '/DATA/AppData/Bazarr/...' have been converted to Docker named volumes (e.g., 'casaos-bazarr_config', 'casaos-bazarr_data'). Ensure these named volumes are suitable or adjust as needed.

title: Calibre-web (CasaOS)

composefile_content:
name: calibre-web
services:

      - DOCKER_MODS=ghcr.io/linuxserver/mods:universal-calibre

    volumes:
      - calibre-web_config:/config
      - type: bind
        source: /DATA/Media/Books
        target: /books
    container_name: calibre-web
volumes:
  calibre-web_config: {}
note:
Portainer template generated from CasaOS AppStore. Original app ID: calibre-web.
Review volumes and configurations. PUID/PGID default to 1000, TZ to Etc/UTC. App-specific paths like '/DATA/AppData/calibre-web/...' have been converted to Docker named volumes (e.g., 'casaos-calibre-web_config', 'casaos-calibre-web_data'). Ensure these named volumes are suitable or adjust as needed.

title: Crafty (CasaOS)
name: casaos-crafty
composefile_content:
name: crafty
version: '3'
services:
  crafty:
    container_name: crafty-container
    image: registry.gitlab.com/crafty-controller/crafty-4:4.4.4
    restart: always
    environment:
      - TZ=Etc/UTC
    ports:
      - '8111:8443'
      - '8112:8123'
      - 19132:19132/udp
      - 25500-25600:25500-25600
    volumes:
      - crafty_backups:/crafty/backups
      - crafty_logs:/crafty/logs
      - crafty_servers:/crafty/servers
      - crafty_config:/crafty/app/config
      - crafty_import:/crafty/import
volumes:
  crafty_backups: {}
  crafty_logs: {}
  crafty_servers: {}
  crafty_config: {}
  crafty_import: {}
note:
Portainer template generated from CasaOS AppStore. Original app ID: crafty.
Review volumes and configurations. PUID/PGID default to 1000, TZ to Etc/UTC. App-specific paths like '/DATA/AppData/crafty/...' have been converted to Docker named volumes (e.g., 'casaos-crafty_config', 'casaos-crafty_data'). Ensure these named volumes are suitable or adjust as needed.

        protocol: tcp
      - target: 8920
        published: '8920'
        protocol: tcp
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - emby_config:/config
      - type: bind
        source: /DATA/Media/TV Shows
        target: /data/tvshows
      - type: bind
        source: /DATA/Media/Movies
        target: /data/movies
    container_name: emby
volumes:
  emby_config: {}

title: EmulatorJS (CasaOS)
name: casaos-emulatorjs
composefile_content:
name: emulatorjs
services:
  emulatorjs:
    environment:
      - PGID=1000
      - PUID=1000
      - SUBFOLDER=/
      - TZ=Etc/UTC
    image: linuxserver/emulatorjs:1.9.2
    network_mode: bridge
    ports:
      - target: 3000
        published: '3001'
        protocol: tcp
      - target: 4001
        published: '4001'
        protocol: tcp
      - target: 80
        published: '88'
        protocol: tcp
    privileged: true
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - emulatorjs_config:/config
      - emulatorjs_data:/data
      - type: bind
        source: /ROMS/nes
        target: /data/nes/roms
    container_name: emulatorjs
volumes:
  emulatorjs_config: {}
  emulatorjs_data: {}
note:
Portainer template generated from CasaOS AppStore. Original app ID: EmulatorJS.
Review volumes and configurations. PUID/PGID default to 1000, TZ to Etc/UTC. App-specific paths like '/DATA/AppData/EmulatorJS/...' have been converted to Docker named volumes (e.g., 'casaos-emulatorjs_config', 'casaos-emulatorjs_data'). Ensure these named volumes are suitable or adjust as needed.

title: MineOS (CasaOS)
name: casaos-mineos-node
composefile_content:
name: mineos-node
services:
  mineos:
    image: hexparrot/mineos:latest
    container_name: mineos_server
    networks:
      - mineos
    restart: unless-stopped
    stop_grace_period: 10m
    volumes:
      - /var/games/mineos/minecraft:/var/games/minecraft
    environment:
      - USE_HTTPS=true
      - SERVER_PORT=8443
      - USER_NAME=mc
      - USER_UID=1000
      - USER_PASSWORD=root
    ports:
      - 8444:8443/tcp
      - 25565-25570:25565-25570/tcp
      - 25565-25570:25565-25570/udp
volumes:
  mineos_data: null
networks:
  mineos: null
note:
Portainer template generated from CasaOS AppStore. Original app ID: mineos-node.
Review volumes and configurations. PUID/PGID default to 1000, TZ to Etc/UTC. App-specific paths like '/DATA/AppData/mineos-node/...' have been converted to Docker named volumes (e.g., 'casaos-mineos-node_config', 'casaos-mineos-node_data'). Ensure these named volumes are suitable or adjust as needed.

composefile_content:
name: nginxproxymanager

    restart: unless-stopped

      - nginxproxymanager_etc_letsencrypt:/etc/letsencrypt
    container_name: nginxproxymanager
volumes:
  nginxproxymanager_data: {}

name: casaos-openhab

name: openhab

    environment:

      - USER=casaos
    image: linuxserver/transmission:4.0.4
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          memory: 64M
    network_mode: bridge
    ports:
      - target: 9091
        published: '9091'
        protocol: tcp
      - target: 51413
        published: '51413'
        protocol: tcp
      - target: 51413
        published: '51413'
        protocol: UDP
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - transmission_config:/config
      - type: bind
        source: /DATA/Downloads
        target: /downloads
      - type: bind
        source: /DATA/Downloads/watch
        target: /watch
    container_name: transmission
volumes:
  transmission_config: {}
note:
Portainer template generated from CasaOS AppStore. Original app ID: transmission.
Review volumes and configurations. PUID/PGID default to 1000, TZ to Etc/UTC. App-specific paths like '/DATA/AppData/transmission/...' have been converted to Docker named volumes (e.g., 'casaos-transmission_config', 'casaos-transmission_data'). Ensure these named volumes are suitable or adjust as needed.

title: Twingate (CasaOS)
name: casaos-twingate-connector
composefile_content:
name: twingate-connector
services:
  twingate-connector:
    image: twingate/connector:1
    container_name: twingate-connector
    command:
      - /connectord
    environment:
      - TWINGATE_NETWORK=
      - TWINGATE_ACCESS_TOKEN=
      - TWINGATE_REFRESH_TOKEN=
      - TWINGATE_LABEL_HOSTNAME=${HOSTNAME}
    restart: unless-stopped
    sysctls:
      net.ipv4.ping_group_range: 0 2147483647
    network_mode: default
    privileged: false
    cpu_shares: 90
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          memory: 500M
note:
Portainer template generated from CasaOS AppStore. Original app ID: twingate-connector.
Review volumes and configurations. PUID/PGID default to 1000, TZ to Etc/UTC. App-specific paths like '/DATA/AppData/twingate-connector/...' have been converted to Docker named volumes (e.g., 'casaos-twingate-connector_config', 'casaos-twingate-connector_data'). Ensure these named volumes are suitable or adjust as needed.

title: Unifi-controller (CasaOS)
name: casaos-unifi-controller
composefile_content:
name: unifi-controller
services:
  unifi-controller:
    environment:
      - MEM_LIMIT=1024
      - MEM_STARTUP=1024
      - PGID=1000
      - PUID=1000
    image: linuxserver/unifi-controller:8.0.7
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          memory: 64M
    network_mode: bridge
    ports:
      - target: 3478
        published: '3478'
        protocol: udp
      - target: 10001
        published: '10001'
        protocol: udp
      - target: 8080
        published: '8383'
        protocol: tcp
      - target: 8443
        published: '8443'
        protocol: tcp
      - target: 1900
        published: '1900'
        protocol: udp
      - target: 8843
        published: '8843'
        protocol: tcp
      - target: 8880
        published: '8880'
        protocol: tcp
      - target: 6789
        published: '6789'
        protocol: tcp
      - target: 5514
        published: '5514'
        protocol: udp
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - unifi-controller_config:/config
    container_name: unifi-controller
volumes:
  unifi-controller_config: {}
note:
Portainer template generated from CasaOS AppStore. Original app ID: unifi-controller.
Review volumes and configurations. PUID/PGID default to 1000, TZ to Etc/UTC. App-specific paths like '/DATA/AppData/unifi-controller/...' have been converted to Docker named volumes (e.g., 'casaos-unifi-controller_config', 'casaos-unifi-controller_data').
